failure.description: images of text should not be used as background images
failure.help: the text should be added as content in the DOM & the background image should be removed

failure.description: decorative images should be marked up in a way that allows assistive tech to ignore them
failure.help: if an image is decorative, add the role of presentation or the role of none to the image

failure.description: decorative images should have an alt attribute, and the attributes value should be empty
failure.help: add the alt attribute with an empty value

failure.description: the alt attribute should be present on img elements, area elements, input elements with the type of image, or elements with the role of img
failure.help: an alt attribute should be present

failure.description: text look-alikes (such as glyphs or HTML entities) should not be used to represent text without alt text
failure.help: add alt text to the glyphs or character entities being used to represent text

failure.description: ASCII art should not be used without providing a text alternative
failure.help: provide a text alternative for the ASCII art

failure.description: SVG elements with the role of image should have alt text
failure.help: add meaningful at text for SVG elements with the role of image

failure.description: SVG elements with the role of image should have a child title element
failure.help: add a title element with meaningful text as a child of the SVG element with the role attribute
